input.sentences: the band was on the stage . their song put us in some sort of trance .
it was strange . the more the song played | the less i knew what was going on .
one of the band members just stood there | watching us .
i thought i was wielding a sword | and the man looked like an orc . this trance was messing with my mind .
we crossed swords | but i won . then the trance was over and i had realized what i done .
output.sentences: She starts the night with their favorite song.
She stays key to what the fans request.
A fan astonished about her performance.
They dance as her band takes over the night.
Her true fans know how to have fun.
